title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist has nothing to suggest, it dirties the file even though it remains unchanged.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirty the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the code editor.
2. Write code that has no suggestions for code assist.
3. Trigger the code assist feature.
4. Verify that the file is dirtied even though it remains unchanged.
